title: Initial Build
description: The Proud Ounces Policy bases are developed by highly skilled lawyers, human resources experts, medical professionals, and real working parents.

title: Customization
description: It is our goal to build a highly effective, creative policy that suits the specific needs and environment of your workplace.

title: Optional Legal Review:
description: The Proud Ounces Policy bases are vetted by employment law experts, however we can provide a final legal review.

title: Final Delivery:
description: You’re ready to roll! We’ll deliver your final Proud Ounces Policy in a format that allows you to make any necessary updates in the future.
